headline: Wall Street is Pounding the Table Over HON, GOOG, AAPL, MSFT, BKNG, and TSLA
summary: Alphabet, Meta, Microsoft, Apple, and Amazon are all set to post earnings this week. Plus, the Federal Reserve is expected to cut interest rates again this week. With such strong catalysts, itâ€™s no wonder that analysts are pounding the table with stock upgrades. Analysts at RBC just upgraded Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) to an outperform rating ...
